A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
No...just no.  I call it a waste of $100 to take the family.  Little kids 10 and under might really like it.  But for everyone else save your cash and rent it or buy the BluRay.

I just wanted to add that I did just create this account (first time every doing this) to post my dissatisfaction with this movie.  I'm not a troll or bot or part of some group trying to take this movie down.  It's just not a very good move and spits in the face of its vast history.

If there is a E9 and Disney keeps down this path it will end up being one their worst investments\, because people will not blindly buy what they're selling.  

I know several people who had to go see it 2x times just to see if it was as bad as they thought.  So again the user reviews are true and have nothing to do with the boat load of money this will make.

For the record I will not be going to see the Solo film.  I'm done after 40 years of SW going to the movies if this is quality that I'm being sold.
